# CollectionExtensions.HasItems&lt;TSource&gt; method

Gets a value that indicates whether the *source* collection contains items.

```csharp
public static bool HasItems<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource>? source)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| TSource | The type of the elements. |
| source | The IEnumerable to check. |

## Return Value

`true` if the *source* is not `null` and contains any item; otherwise, `false`.
